question: Ravens vs. Texans
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for January 20 at 4:30 PM ET:

If the Baltimore Ravens win, the market will resolve to “Ravens”.

If the Houston Texans win, the market will resolve to “Texans”.

 If the game is not completed by January 27, 2024 (11:59 PM ET) or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NFL
events.description: This is a market group for NFL games happening on 2024-01-20

question: 49ers vs. Packers
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for January 20 at 8:15 PM ET:

If the San Francisco 49ers win, the market will resolve to “49ers”.

If the Green Bay Packers win, the market will resolve to “Packers”.

 If the game is not completed by January 27, 2024 (11:59 PM ET) or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the median gas price per blob be <0.0001 ETH one month after EIP-4844?
description:
Ethereum Improvement Proposal 4844 (or “proto-danksharding”) is a major step toward scaling Ethereum. It lowers the cost of posting L2 rollup data to the Ethereum mainnet via “blobs” (see https://consensys.io/blog/ethereum-evolved-dencun-upgrade-part-5-eip-4844). There has been much discussion about what the gas prices per blob will be after EIP-4844 is introduced.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the median gas price per blob is less than 0.0001 ETH one month after EIP-4844 launch. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

If EIP-4844 hasn’t been launched by Dec 31, 2024 ET this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be on-chain data for blob prices exactly 30 days (720 hours) after EIP-4844 is launched. Specifically, 30 days after EIP-4844 is launched, the median gas price per blob during the following 7-day (168 hour) period will be calculated and used to resolve this market. This market may be updated with specific sources that will be looked at for determining resolution.

events.title: Gas price per blob 1 month after EIP-4844?

question: Will the median gas price per blob be between 0.0001 and 0.001 ETH one month after EIP-4844?
description:
Ethereum Improvement Proposal 4844 (or “proto-danksharding”) is a major step toward scaling Ethereum. It lowers the cost of posting L2 rollup data to the Ethereum mainnet via “blobs” (see https://consensys.io/blog/ethereum-evolved-dencun-upgrade-part-5-eip-4844). There has been much discussion about what the gas prices per blob will be after EIP-4844 is introduced.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the median gas price per blob is greater than or equal to 0.0001 ETH and less than 0.001 ETH one month after EIP-4844 launch. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

If EIP-4844 hasn’t been launched by Dec 31, 2024 ET this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be on-chain data for blob prices exactly 30 days (720 hours) after EIP-4844 is launched. Specifically, 30 days after EIP-4844 is launched, the median gas price per blob during the following 7-day (168 hour) period will be calculated and used to resolve this market. This market may be updated with specific sources that will be looked at for determining resolution.

question: Will Argentina dollarize in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Argentina begins to peg its currency to the United States dollar (USD), or adopts the United States dollar as official legal tender in 2024 (ET). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement that dollarization will begin will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" - for this market to resolve to "Yes", dollarization must have actually begun.

Note: a peg does not need to be 1:1 to USD.

This market's resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting indicating either of the listed scenarios have begun.

events.title: Will Argentina dollarize in 2024?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Argentina begins to peg its currency to the United States dollar (USD), or adopts the United States dollar as official legal tender in 2024 (ET). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement that dollarization will begin will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" - for this market to resolve to "Yes", dollarization must have actually begun.

Note: a peg does not need to be 1:1 to USD.

This market's resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting indicating either of the listed scenarios have begun.

question: Sundar Pichai out as Google CEO in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Sundar Pichai is no longer serving as CEO of Google for any length of time from the date of this market's inception, January 18, through December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement of Sundar Pichai's resignation/firing before this market's end date will immediately resolve this market to "Yes", regardless of when the announced resignation/firing goes into effect.

This market's primary resolution source will be official information from Google and/or Sundar Pichai, however a consensus of credible reporting sources will also be used.

events.title: Sundar Pichai out as Google CEO in 2024?
events.description:

This market's primary resolution source will be official information from Google and/or Sundar Pichai, however a consensus of credible reporting sources will also be used.

question: Houthis strike U.S. military by end of January?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Houthis carry out a military strike against the U.S. military, inclusive of all U.S. military ships, planes, bases and other infrastructure by January 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

Houthi missile and drone strikes which are shot down or miss their targets will not be considered for this market. Strikes on U.S. military unmanned aerial vehicles/projectiles and U.S. commercial/civilian ships will NOT count toward a "Yes" resolution. 

The resolution source for this market is official statements from the U.S. government, however a consensus of credible may also be used.

question: US call for Gaza ceasefire before March?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the US president, US secretary of state or official statements from the White House officially call for Israel to establish a ceasefire between themselves and Hamas in Gaza between January 18, 2023 and February 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, calls for a humanitarian pause will not be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements from the US president, US secretary of state, the White House, and/or their official representatives.

question: Did MrBeast's Twitter post with over 124m views make between $0 and $5k?
description:
On Jan 19 MrBeast posted the following on X (https://twitter.com/MrBeast/status/1748422852401942967) asking people to guess how much revenue his tweet with over 124m views made.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if MrBeast announces his X/Twitter post with over 124m views (https://x.com/MrBeast/status/1747044525116108854) made less than $5,000. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the amount of money made by the post is not known by January 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from MrBeast, however a consensus of credible information may also be used.

events.title: How much $ did MrBeast’s Twitter post with 124m views make?

question: Will Israel invade Lebanon before March?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel commences a military offensive intended to establish control over any portion of Lebanon by February 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be will be official confirmation by Lebanon, Israel, the United Nations, or any permanent member of the UN Security Council, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
